a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Countries that are long-standing liberal democracies, World
Political regimes based on the classificationn by Lührmann et al. (2018) and the estimates by V-Dem’s experts.
Liberal democracies are understood here as political systems that hold meaningful, free and fair, and multi-party
elections, and their citizens have further individual rights, are equal before the law, and the legislative and the
Note: The share of closed autocracies increases a lot in 1900 because V-Dem covers many more countries since then, often colonies.
